channel.title: Weeknotes on üåÄ bledleys blog
channel.description: Recent content in Weeknotes on üåÄ bledleys blog

item.title: Week Notes 2025 W29
item.description:
Wins ‚≠ê

  • Put on an event on Friday night. We hardly sold any tickets in advance and 2 acts pulled out on the day. It was looking bleak but when it came down to it on the night, the turn out was alright, the room was full enough and the vibe was good. I was particularly impressed with Liverpool band Ancient Hostility and the experimental films of Things Found and Made.

Art üé®

  • Made a little progress on some studies in Krita. Still working on the habit of getting started with something early before the day gets in the way. I may be able to post something soon…

Reading üìö

  • Just been reading the internet mostly this week.. yeah.. I know but like.. peoples small blogs and stuff.. not trash.

Writing ‚úçüèª

  • Had to rebuild my Hugo site on Monday - deleted all the old posts (It’s ok, still have the markdown files locally). I would have had to go through all the old posts and adjust the formatting of the internal links on those. A lot of those posts where just event promotion or art dumping with little accompanying wordage anyway. I’d prefer an almost clean state wth just a few recent posts and build from that. That took more time out of my week than it probably should but I think I understand this much theme better now.

  • Published recently on the blog:

    • I’m ditching Letterboxd
    • A new theme, a new hope

Health üí™üèª

  • Upped my average daily steps but didn’t run as much as I’d like - I could blame the weather..

Watching üìΩ

  • The Ugly Stepsister (2025)
    • It’s like a Norwegian the ‘The Substance’. Similar themes of unattainable beauty standards with some gruesome body horror. It’s a dark fairy tale/horror take on the Cinderella story. It’s good, but not for the squeamish. One you will need to recover from.
  • The Flash (2023)
    • Mostly annoying multiverse stuff but was surprised to hear Michael Keaton’s Batman is in it, so I had to check out those bits.
  • Dexter Resurrection
    • I’m liking the female detective who “sees things others don’t”. No idea what’s going on with Uma Thurman’s character yet..some kind of secret society for serial killers?
  • Narcos
    • I don’t know why it took me so long to get around to watching this one. Can already tell this is right up my street from the first couple of episodes.

Interesting ü§î

  • Trying out olauncher. It’s a really simple, minimal Android launcher without any icons and just text.

Leave a comment by email or you can find me on the Fediverse

item.title: Week Notes 2025-W28
item.description:
Wins ‚≠ê

  • Created a series of promotional posts, bio’s and images for performers at a gig next week

  • Implemented an invisible Waybar module that calls my email syncing script. It calls mbsync and does some initial notmuch tagging. Another custom module shows a simple indicator for new and unread mail.

  • Adding many blogs, socials accounts and YouTube channels to my RSS reader to seriously reduce use of distracting, bloated websites.

Reading üìö

  • Finished reading Mastering Emacs by Mickey Peterson. I did skim over some parts as this is more of a reference book.

Writing ‚úçüèª

  • Posted to the blog ‘Being Less Evil’ about disabling evil-mode in Doom Emacs.

Health üí™üèª

  • I got a couple of short but fairly lame runs in. The heat has been pretty wild this week. If I don’t get out early I’ll likely not go at all.

Watching üìΩ

  • Watched PSG v Real Madrid but tuned in late and missed all the goals.

  • Some old episodes of DS9. I’m looking for some funky aliens to draw.

  • First two episodes of Dexter Resurrection. Dexter makes me feel nostalgic about the early 2000’s.. glad it’s back.

Play üéÆ

  • When I get a minute I’ve been playing Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory on Xbox.

Listening üéµ

  • Had a bit of a wine and music night Saturday, posted some ska tunes to Mastodon.

Improvements ‚¨Ü

  • Not making enough time for artwork. I have a couple of monochrome studies on the go in Krita but I don’t feel they are worth rendering out to completion. I need to start something new, fresh and more exciting.

  • Really need to increase my exercise. Just going for some good long walks will likely improve my running performance.

  • I want to get out more with my camera so I’ve got some material to post to Pixelfed.

Interesting ü§î

  • powRSS is a nice way to discover lots of small web blogs.

  • Nerd Fonts Cheat Sheet I get so much use out of this in my configs.

Leave a comment by email or you can find me on the Fediverse
